attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: MIT researchers have developed FragFold, a new computational method that predicts protein fragments, offering significant potential for advancements in biological research and therapeutics.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: A recent study reveals that large language models (LLMs) can reason about diverse types of data similarly to human brains, providing insights into their understanding of meaning across different languages.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: ReviveMed, an MIT spinout, is leveraging AI technology to analyze metabolites in the body, aiming to identify hidden disease drivers and improve patient-targeted therapies.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: The entertainment industry is undergoing a transformation driven by AI and emerging technologies, reshaping how content is created and consumed, challenging media and entertainment brands to innovate.
